column6: If you have tears, prepare to share them now.  For, as X-Factor and the Black Cat battles the S.C.A.R. in a desperate attempt to save J. Jonah Jameson--yes, THAT J. Jonah Jameson--one of our heroes lies dying, and survival isn't looking too likely.
column7: | M (Monet St. Croix) | Strong Guy | X-Men
column8: | writer:Peter David | editor:Nick Lowe | penciller:EMANUELA LUPACCHINO | penciller (cover):David Yardin
